price: 4. Welzeker, Wij zijn in staat om de toppen van zijn vingers weer volmaakt in elkaar te zetten.
arabic: بَلَىٰ قَٰدِرِينَ عَلَىٰٓ أَن نُّسَوِّيَ بَنَانَهُۥ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: balā qādirīna ʿalā an nusawwiya banānahu
